column2: Some tolerate sun , but most prefer part shade , especially in hotter climate .
== Exposure == Coreopsis lanceolata thrives in full sun ( 4–6 hour of direct sunlight per day ) .
== Exposure == Coreopsis lanceolata thrives in full sun ( 4–6 hour of direct sunlight per day ) .
Plants in shade have larger leaf than those grown in sun .
It prefers partial to almost full shade , with morning sun and afternoon shade a optimal .
In the United Kingdom L. muscari ha gained the Royal Horticultural Society 's Award of Garden Merit.The specie is easily grown in average , medium , well-drained soil in full sun to part shade .

However loutish the American-born son of the family may be , there wa never one who refused to give his muscle to the back-breaking task of getting those tubbed tree down into the cellar in the fall and up into the sunlight in the spring .
It grows in either full or three quarter sunlight , in well-drained soil .
